p: The genus Machilus Rumph. ex Nees is comprised of around 100 species distributed in southern and south-eastern Asia [ 12, 14]. Machilus balansae (Airy Shaw) F.N. Wei & S.C. Tang (syn. Persea balansae Airy Shaw) is endemic to Vietnam and is generally found at low elevations in north Vietnam [ 30]. Machilus grandifolia S.K. Lee & F.N. Wei is now regarded as a new synonym of M. balansae [ 30]. To our knowledge, there have been no phytochemical studies reported on M. balansae or M. grandifolia.
